about_the_game:
Christopher Robin needs your help.

Lovecraftian Horror




The Hundred Acre Wood has been twisted by an Otherworldly Power. Discover what has happened to this once peaceful place as you learn the Deep Truths in this first person action adventure. The world is no longer what it was, but does that mean it is what it seems?

A Rich Story Filled World




Explore a horrifying, but familiar memory as you learn why the woods have changed, and gather what you need to rescue Christopher Robin from a fate too terrible to imagine. Based on the 1926 Classic "Winnie-the-Pooh" by A. A. Milne, experience a world full of Heffalumps, Woozles, and old friends such as Eeyore, Rabbit, Owl, Piglet, and of course Winnie-the-Pooh.

Non-Linear Exploration




Run, hide, platform, solve puzzles, and shoot as you explore the Hundred Acre Wood's regions in any order you want. Do whatever it takes to avoid Winnie-the-Pooh as you sneak past the hostile creatures and cult members hiding in the darkness. Discover the ruins of a once innocent child’s refuge as you uncover ancient secrets hinting at a reality beyond human comprehension.

content_descriptors.notes: Hundred Acre Wood contains scenes of violence including moderate gore, blood, general mature and frightening content that may not be appropriate for all audiences.

name: Hundred Acre Wood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit or later
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Ti
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
  • Sound Card: 100% DirectX compatible card or onboard sound

short_description: Explore and survive a twisted Hundred Acre Wood while being hunted by an old childhood friend, Winnie-the-Pooh. Rescue Christopher Robin with the help of Eldritch Beasts that were once familiar faces. Discover what took place and has changed a once beautiful land into something dark and dangerous.
